import React from 'react' import {Button, Header, Modal} from 'semantic-ui-react' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' const LaunchItem = ({ rocket }) => { return(
{rocket.mission_name}
{rocket.details}

Rocket Type:
{rocket.rocket.rocket_name}
Launch Year:
{rocket.launch_year}
Launch Site:
{rocket.launch_site.site_name}


Customer:
{rocket.rocket.second_stage.payloads[0].customers}
Nationality:
{rocket.rocket.second_stage.payloads[0].nationality}
Payload Type:
{rocket.rocket.second_stage.payloads[0].payload_type}
Watch Video}> Watch Video
) } export default LaunchItem;
